genres: Action, Adventure, Science Fiction, Fantasy, Drama
overview: An edited version of the first five episodes of Peacemaker Season 2, shown exclusively to press and select fans at a special premiere event in New York and other preview screenings in early August 2025. Following the explosive aftermath of Season 1, Christopher Smith, aka Peacemaker, returns to confront new moral dilemmas, uneasy alliances, and the ghosts of his past as his world spirals further into chaos and redemption.
